title: New 2021 Speedmaster Moonwatch Professional Co-Axial Master Chronometer 42mm Mens

description.text: Inspired by the 4th generation Speedmaster style worn on the moon, the Speedmaster Moonwatch is one of Omega’s most iconic timepieces. Having been part of all six moon landings, this legendary watch captures the heart of brand’s pioneering spirit. Demonstrating the brand’s commitment to evolution, this new 2021 edition offers even more reliability, precision and excellence with Master Chronometer certification.
details: Inspired by the 4th generation Speedmaster style worn on the moon
42mm stainless steel case secured with a stainless steel strap

description.text: Expertly designed to be both a lightweight watch for athletes and a casual, everyday sports chronograph, the Endurance Pro is the ultimate athleisure watch. Offering expert precision, vibrant and colourful designs, the latest innovative technology and outstanding endurance, this performance-focused collection is ideal for those with a professional mindset and an active lifestyle. The case is crafted from exclusive, 100% Swiss-made Breitlight® - an ultra-light, robust material that is 3.3 times lighter than titanium and 5.8 times lighter than stainless steel, as well as being non-magnetic, thermally stable, and hypoallergenic.
details: An athletic watch blending high precision, innovation, and vibrant design
44mm Breitlight® case paired with a sophisticated blue rubber strap
Powered by the Breitling 82 calibre movement, a COSC-certified SuperQuartz™ chronograph

description.text: Bringing together modern materials and the latest timekeeping technology, the Classic Fusion range remains true to the brand’s trademark Porthole design. Presented on a sleek black alligator leather strap and showcasing an understated charm, this Men’s Classic Fusion Timepiece will coordinate with any look, no matter what the occasion. Housed by a 42mm titanium case and bezel with six H-shaped screws, the striking black dial is organised with a date display window at 3 o’clock, rhodium-plated hour markers and hands and complete with a sapphire crystal glass for protection. Water resistant up to 100 metres, this effortlessly stylish time accessory is driven by a reliable HUB1112 automatic movement.

title: Big Pilot's 'Le Petit Prince' 46mm Mens Watch

description.text: Inspired by the iconic story of the Little Prince, this Men’s Big Pilot’s Le Petit Prince Watch is powered by reliable, automatic movement for enhanced precision and performance. Set within a 46mm stainless steel case, the striking midnight blue dial plays host to luminescent hands and hour markers, a power reserve display at 3 o’clock and a date display at 6 o’clock. Secured with a brown Santoni leather strap, the robust case features an engraving of the Little Prince on the back. Inspired by aviation, the Pilots family was first introduced in the 1930s for civil engineering purposes and has since established a reputation for precision timepieces with outstanding technology.

Schaffhausen, 15th October 2020 – IWC Schaffhausen complements its TOP GUN range of Pilot’s Watches with the Pilot’s Watch Chronograph TOP GUN Edition “SFTI”. The new model takes inspiration from the “Strike Fighter Tactics Instructor” watch, which was created in 2018 in honor of the US Naval Aviation Community and is available only for TOPGUN graduates. Thanks to the combination of a black ceramic case with a Ceratanium® case back and pushers, the sporty chronograph boasts a tactical, matte black design code. In 2018, IWC created the Pilot’s Watch Chronograph Edition “Strike Fighter Tactics Instructor” in collaboration with instructors based on Naval Air Station Leemore in California. Featuring a case made of black ceramic and the iconic TOPGUN patch on the dial, the rugged chronograph is available exclusively for graduates of the Navy Fighter Weapons School.

title: Made with Liberty Fabric Leaf Print Semi-Cutaway Collar Shirt - Indigo Blue

description.text: The intricate Liberty designs spring vividly to life on the quality, Italian-woven fabric. It's crafted from Superfine 2-ply yarn with a poplin weave, which creates a lightweight cloth that's strong, smooth and supple.There's a choice of Liberty's signature prints in rich colours, with complementary details such as navy piping. These versatile shirts can be dressed up for work or a wedding, or worn with our Ultimate Chinos for a more relaxed weekend style.
details: Available in classic and slim fit

Model wears: M in Slim fit

title: Semi-Cutaway Collar Luxury Twill Shirt - Sky

description.text: Woven using two-fold 140s Egyptian Giza yarn, this shirt is extremely durable. For a fuller range of movement, the back yoke is made up of four separate pieces. Its classic light-blue shade makes this shirt a great staple that's universally flattering and easy to coordinate. Dress it down with chinos or add a silk tie for a polished finish.
details: Available in classic, slim and extra slim fit
Split yoke for optimal fit and comfort
Classic and slim fit: back pleats for ease of movement
Extra slim fit: streamline back darts
Rounded two-button single cuff or square double cuff

description.text: Designed for the man on the move, this Travel Suit jacket is made from pure Super 120s merino wool; midweight for wearing in any climate, and with crease-recovery to keep it looking smart. The birdseye-weave fabric creates a timeless look.Built to our Traditional cut for a classic silhouette, the jacket is single-breasted with a two-button fastening, and a half-canvas construction for a superior fit over time. Subtle tailoring touches, including four-button working cuffs, twin back vents, and notch lapels, set it apart.
details: Available in classic and slim fit

description.text: This suave new suit is crafted from Super 120s wool, giving you superb crease recovery and natural stretch for ease of movement. We've used pure Merino wool for a soft and supple hand feel. The fine fabric emphasises the distinctive dotted weave. Thanks to the hardy Merino sheep, this refined wool is also strong, breathable and temperature-regulating, keeping you comfortable from season to season.
details: Super 120's woolmark certified pure merino wool
Available in classic and slim fit
Jacket: Single breasted with two urea button fastening
Jacket: Straight flap pockets, chest pocket and internal jet pockets
Trousers: Taped hems for a secure finish to the bottom of the garment
Waistcoat: Adjustable back belt in lining fabric

title: Shawl Lapel Dinner Suit - Dark Navy

description.text: When it comes to formal tailoring, luxury is always high on our priority list – and our dinner suit is no exception. Showcasing a reinvigorated design, we've made it from Super 120s Woolmark-certified Merino wool for breathability and to retain its shape. The classic details are also in check – note the superfine ottoman rib trim and satin buttons. Whatever the occasion, you're sure to impress when sporting our dinner wear.
details: Super 120's Woolmark certified pure merino wool
Jacket: Single breasted with one-button fastening
Trousers: Taped hems for a secure finish to the bottom of the garment

title: Natural Stretch Twill Suit - Royal Blue

description.text: Need a versatile suit that takes you from your desk to dinner? Tyrwhitt has your back with our most popular twill style.
details: Super 100's woolmark certified pure merino wool
Available in classic and slim fit
Jacket: Single breasted with two urea button fastening
Jacket: Straight flap pockets, chest pocket and internal jet pockets
Trousers: Taped hems for a secure finish to the bottom of the garment

title: Prince of Wales Check Suit - Oatmeal

description.text: We think it's the sum of the parts. That's why this jacket is woven in a brushed Super 120s flannel wool for a soft texture with just the right amount of drape. We've even tweaked the construction for optimum comfort. This slim-fit jacket is the dream thickness for winter wear and features a Prince of Wales check that's subtle and complex (like a good wine); the intricacy of the pattern is only revealed if you look closely.
details: Body lining: exclusive Charles Tyrwhitt lapwing 55% polyester, 45% viscose lining in taupe
Trousers: taped hems for a secure finish to the bottom of the garment

description.text: Whether you need to look smart or you’re in jeans and a T-shirt, this jacket has got your back. The cotton blend we’ve used is rain-resistant, moisture-wicking and durable. No overheating or rain allowed here. The contemporary, utilitarian style has plenty of handy pockets, plus an adjustable drawstring waist so you have the option for a fitted finish.
details: Available in S M L sizing
Main body lining: 52% polyester, 48% viscose in dark navy
Concealed snap button fastening with zip
Four front flap pockets styling for functionality with snap closure
Internal pocket with snap button closure for essential items

description.text: Whether you need to look smart or you’re in jeans and a T-shirt, this jacket has got your back. The cotton blend we’ve used is rain-resistant, moisture-wicking and durable. No overheating or rain allowed here. The contemporary, utilitarian style has plenty of handy pockets, plus an adjustable drawstring waist so you have the option for a fitted finish.
details: Available in S M L sizing
Main bodu lining: 52% polyester, 48% viscose in olive green
Concealed snap button fastening with zip
Four front flap pockets styling for functionality with snap closure
Adjustable waist drawcord for a closer fit
Internal pocket with snap button closure for essential items

description.text: For timeless outerwear, choose our pure wool overcoat. It's made from fine Merino fibres, which are renowned for being both warm and breathable. Finishing touches include smooth welt pockets and a back vent that allows easy movement.

When the weather isn’t playing ball, reach for our classic raincoat. The single-breasted design is crafted from smooth cotton and features a showerproof finish that quickly recovers from creases to keep you looking sharp. Embroidered underarm eyelets are on hand to provide additional ventilation, while the back vent and soft shoulders ensure a comfortable fit. This raincoat is an assured choice, whatever your day has in store. Wear yours over a suit or more casual layers.
details: Main body lining: 55% polyester 45% viscose in navy
Contrast piping and jets in grey for a pop of colour
Single breasted, concealed placket with five-urea button fastening
Angled welt pockets and internal jet pockets
Cuff tab with adjustable button closure

description.text: For timeless outerwear, choose our pure wool overcoat. It's made from fine Merino fibres, which are renowned for being both warm and breathable. We've added Corozo-nut buttons and four-button cuffs to give this coat an elevated feel. Finishing touches include smooth welt pockets and a back vent that allows easy movement.
details: Body Lining: Exclusive Charles Tywhitt Lapwing lining in navy
Double breasted with six-button showing using corozo nut buttons which are a natural product known for their durability
Peak lapel, angled welt pockets and single back vent
Three internal jet pockets with contrasting jets in taupe
AMF stitching on the collar, lapel centre front and welt pockets

title: New Era 9Fifty Chicago Bulls all over patch cap in red

description.text: American label New Era have long enjoyed a relationship with the world of baseball, manufacturing baseball hats for teams since the 1930s. As popular off field as they are on, New Era caps are standard issue amongst those with a passion for street culture, blending progressive styles with carefully crafted design. Known for their innovative use of colour, bold designs are added season upon season, referencing everything from street art to iconic cartoon characters.

title: New Era 9Fifty Brooklyn Nets neon logo cap in black

description.text: American label New Era have long enjoyed a relationship with the world of baseball, manufacturing baseball hats for teams since the 1930s. As popular off field as they are on, New Era caps are standard issue amongst those with a passion for street culture, blending progressive styles with carefully crafted design. Known for their innovative use of colour, bold designs are added season upon season, referencing everything from street art to iconic cartoon characters.

title: New Era 9Fifty LA Lakers all over patch cap in white

description.text: American label New Era have long enjoyed a relationship with the world of baseball, manufacturing baseball hats for teams since the 1930s. As popular off field as they are on, New Era caps are standard issue amongst those with a passion for street culture, blending progressive styles with carefully crafted design. Known for their innovative use of colour, bold designs are added season upon season, referencing everything from street art to iconic cartoon characters.

First thought up in the shadow of Europe’s highest peak, the Monte Bianco, outdoors-loving brand Napapijri has been combining innovative materials with close attention to style since 1987. Take cover when the temperature drops in its quilted jackets and hoodies.

Champion has been sorting your street-meets-sportswear styles through the decades. Whether you’re a frequent gym goer, new to the tracks or just want to look good lounging, the New York brand and its iconic logo have got you covered. Scroll our Champion at ASOS edit to find comfy sweats, cool T-shirts, cosy joggers and training shorts. We feel a wardrobe refresh coming on.

The soles are leather too for a traditional Chelsea look, with a rubber heel for better grip; and are Goodyear welted, allowing the shoes to be repaired and resoled for years to come. A leather lining and insole make the shoes comfortable, as does the cork filler that moulds to your feet over time.
details: Leather sole with hard wearing rubber heel

title: Suede Oxford Brogue Shoes - Dark Chocolate

description.text: No wardrobe is complete without a pair of Oxfords. Possibly the most versatile shoes a man can own, they bring a polished yet understated feel to your ensembles. We've crafted this style using the finest suede and a Goodyear Welted construction for a breathable and durable finish. Inside, we've added a filler to the sole, which moulds to your feet to ensure a supremely comfortable fit.
details: Leather sole with hard wearing rubber heel

description.text: Looking for serious sophistication? You can stop your search. Our Oxford shoes are ready for anything. No wardrobe is complete without a pair of Oxfords. Possibly the most versatile shoes a man can own, they bring a polished yet understated feel to your ensembles. We've crafted this style using the finest calf leather and a Goodyear Welted construction for a breathable and durable finish. Inside, we've added a filler to the sole, which moulds to your feet to ensure a supremely comfortable fit.
details: Leather sole with hard wearing rubber heel

description.text: A good pair of boots will carry you from season to season. We've crafted ours from 100% leather in both upper and lining to ensure longevity and because it ages splendidly. Dark tan, with elegant and traditional broguing, pairs just as well with light chinos as it does with a dark-coloured suit. We've not only tweaked the width for a more comfortable fit, but we've also added a flexible rubber sole and deep foam filler that moulds to your foot.
details: EVA foam filler moulds to your foot

description.text: An elegant occasion shoe, perfect for grounding a tuxedo, dinner jacket, or black tie look. Made from high-shine black patent Italian leather for a traditional, dressy look.
details: 100% leather lining with full leather insock
Leather sole with moulded heel tip

description.text: Our lightweight smart-casual trousers are crafted from a breathable cotton with a stretch base, for easy movement and all-day comfort. Cut to our new tailoring block, they have a curved waistband and slimmer legs for an improved fit. A French bearer at the fly keeps the finish crisp.
details: Available in classic and slim fit
Side entry pocket and welt pocket on reverse
Belt loops to fit 4.5 cm belt

description.text: We've updated our Ultimate Non-Iron Chinos with a slimmer leg and a comfortable, curved waistband, so you can enjoy an improved fit. They're made from a cotton with a hint of stretch for easy movement and superior softness. Better still? The stain-resistant fabric doesn't hold marks, so it stays looking new for longer. Wear these versatile chinos all year round – they're the smart choice for desk-to-dinner dressing.
details: Available in classic, slim and extra slim fit
Pre-washed fabric for a soft handfeel
Side entry pockets with jet pockets on reverse
Curved waistband for a perfect fit
Belt loops to fit 4.5 cm belt
